dc_description_s: The MD_Surface_Waters Feature Dataset includes 7 feature classes that geospatially depict the surface water bodies of Maryland. These feature classes are being provided so that data from the 2012 Integrated Report of Surface Water Quality can be displayed in geographic form for users of all levels. These different feature classes represent the different assessment unit scales utilized on the 2012 IR, some of which overlap in space. In addition, provided in the attribute tables for the Impoundments, Rivers_Streams, and Tidal_Waters feature classes is the use class designation as specified in COMAR Section 26.08.02.08. More information about these feature classes is contained in the metadata for each feature class.Map Service Link: http://mdewin64.mde.state.md.us/arcgis/rest/services/MDE_Water_Quality/MD_IntegratedReportSurfaceWaterQuality_2013/MapServer
